Melbourne Forecast

No warnings for Victoria

Forecast issued at 5:05 am EDT on Tuesday 9 March 2021.

Forecast for the rest of Tuesday

Summary
Max 20
Possible shower.
Possible rainfall: 0 to 1 mm
Chance of any rain: 40%

Melbourne area

Mostly cloudy. The chance of fog in the southeast suburbs early this morning. High (60%) chance of light showers about the eastern suburbs grading to a slight (30%) chance in the west. Sunny breaks increasing later in the afternoon. Light winds becoming southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then tending southerly in the middle of the day.

Fire Danger - Low-Moderate

Sun protection recommended from 10:10 am to 4:50 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 8 [Very High]

7 day Town Forecasts

Precis Icon Location Min Max
Melbourne – 20
Geelong – 21
Laverton – 20
Tullamarine – 20
Scoresby – 21
Watsonia – 20
Mount Dandenong – 16
Yarra Glen – 21
Frankston – 21

Wednesday 10 March

Summary
Min 13
Max 21
Partly cloudy.
Chance of any rain: 5%

Melbourne area

The chance of fog in the early morning. Mostly sunny afternoon. Light winds becoming southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then tending southerly in the middle of the day.

Sun protection recommended from 10:10 am to 4:50 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 8 [Very High]

Thursday 11 March

Summary
Min 12
Max 25
Partly cloudy.
Chance of any rain: 5%

Melbourne area

The chance of morning fog. Mostly sunny afternoon. Light winds becoming south to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening.

Sun protection recommended from 10:10 am to 4:40 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 8 [Very High]

Friday 12 March

Summary
Min 16
Max 28
Partly cloudy.
Chance of any rain: 10%

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. The chance of morning fog. Light winds.

Sun protection recommended from 10:10 am to 4:40 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 8 [Very High]

Saturday 13 March

Summary
Min 19
Max 27
A few showers.
Possible rainfall: 6 to 15 mm
Chance of any rain: 70%

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely later in the day. Winds northerly 20 to 30 km/h turning westerly during the day.

Sunday 14 March

Summary
Min 11
Max 18
A few showers.
Possible rainfall: 2 to 10 mm
Chance of any rain: 60%

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely during the morning. Winds west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h.

Monday 15 March

Summary
Min 12
Max 19
Possible shower.
Possible rainfall: 0 to 2 mm
Chance of any rain: 40%

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h turning south to southwesterly during the day.

The next routine forecast will be issued at 4:20 pm EDT Tuesday.

Product IDV10450
